import './Profile.css' import { Container, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Profile = ({ loggedUser }) => { deleteThisUser = () => { const book_id = this.props.match.params.book_id this.bookService .deleteBook(book_id) .then(res => { this.props.history.push('/libros') }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (
